channel.title: Yell command

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Try this. I edited your code but i havent tested it. It looks like it should work. I moved the “player” to the bottom so that if you have secret admins, meaning playerRights = 4, then it classes them as a player. You should understand it.

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“yell”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String title = “”;
if(playerRights == 1){
title = “[Mod]”;
break;
} else if(playerRights == 2){
title = “[Admin]”;
break;
} else if(playerRights == 3){
title = “[Owner]”;
break;
} else {
title = “[Player]”;
break;
}

		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + " " + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5);
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @killer90210 killer90210
item.description:
@killer90210 wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");

                                                                                                  else if(playerRights == 1) {
							PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "["+pModTitle[0]+"] "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
						}
							if(playerRights >= 2) {
							PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "["+pModTitle[1]+"] "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
						}
							if(playerRights >= 3) {
							PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "["+pModTitle[2]+"] "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
						}

                                                                                          if(playerRights == 0) {
							PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
						}[/code]

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @java_got_me_compiled java got me compiled
item.description:
@java_got_me_compiled wrote:

i need help, i have it but it doesnt say [owner] and stuff

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("yell") && playerRights >= 2) { String title = ""; switch(playerRights) { case 0: title = "[Player]"; break; case 1: title = "[Mod]"; break; case 2: title = "[Admin]"; break; case 3: title = "[Owner]"; break; } PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + " " + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5); }
